website_summaries.verdict: An incredible sandwich maker for a mid-range price. Its versatility to make breakfast, lunch, dinner, and desserts separates it from the rest of the pack.
pros: Easy-to-clean, interchangeable plates make both waffles and sandwiches
Stores upright, saving space on the counter or in the cabinet
cons: Though the grill plates are deeper than some models, thicker items might not cook evenly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Look no Further than this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: We use this thing all the time! I bought it because our waffle make broke, and liked the idea that the plates could be removed and washed in the dishwasher. But the best feature is the pocket plates that we ended up using much more than the waffle plates! This machine does a great job and evenly cooking everything you throw into it. Sometimes and wrap different things in pizza dough and it looks like a big mess when I set it into this thing, but when its done cooking and I open it back up it reveals a perfect pizza pocket! I don't know how it does it, but it does it well!
customer_reviews.author: CampbellCrew

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted three uses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for Christmas and we have used it maybe three times. We were very disappointed today when it would not heat up anymore! it needs to be exchanged but it says my return window is closed. Very disappointed. I would not recommmend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect loaf the first time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect loaf the first time. This make and model was recommended to me by GF Jules, the company that I use for gluten free products. This T-Fal breadmaker has a GF setting, and it worked great, using the specific directions from GF Jules. No complaints. Easy to use and to clean, great results.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Boring lunches no more!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this thing! I have been using this for about a month now, and am very happy with it. Cleanup has been a breeze, which was a priority for me. Can't believe what a difference toasting a boring lunch meat sandwiches makes! I'm a busy mom of 5, I don't have time to spoil myself, let alone sit to enjoy a nice lunch. This thing toasts so fast, it's easy to find the time! Makes perfect grilled cheese sandwiches too, edible even to my picky eater. I'll be trying the waffle tray soon, I'll bet easy money it will make brunch fast, and not leave a huge mess behind!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions, Bread Not Done, Gluten Free Health Hazards
customer_reviews.text: Manual was terrible, scattered, in poor English. No logical step by step instructions. Some important start items appeared on the last page. Interior is coated in Teflon, a carcinogen. The machine does not properly bake gluten free flours, and tapioca flour is poisonous if not thoroughly baked, beware! After wrestling with this incredibly unfriendly machine, I removed the “bread” and finished baking it in my oven in order to safely eat it, nearly $11 worth of ingredients. I even used program 2, which allegedly bakes longer than the others. I will try to return it, but if unsuccessful, I will give it away, as I never want to see it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bastanza

customer_reviews.title: Very handy pocket sandwich making device!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it so many time making cheese pockets. Sometimes i also add ham or peperroni. Taste great. Just has to stand around to not over cook, i usually let it cook less than 2 mins. My son does nto like his sandwich to be too burnt. it will be great if they have auto shut off. It does take about 5 mins to heat up before you can use it. But i am very satisfy with my purchase. I have not used the Waffle feature though.
customer_reviews.author: Up Up

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase, don't overfill
customer_reviews.text: We're happy with this purchase. If you over fill the batter for waffles it spills over and defeats "the easy clean up". But this is totally within your control. It takes a little practice to get a good sense of how much to use. The plates being dishwasher friendly is a huge plus. Only other problem I find is that when it heats up, it makes a funny smell. We've been using for several weeks and although it is not as strong as it was in the beginning, it still has an odor when it heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Yummy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use - Plug in, wait for green light to go on (mine only takes a minute or two), place sandwich in, close lid, green light will shut off, wait for green light to go on again, open, serve. If you like your sandwich or waffles a little more done; close again and check in a minute to see if they are done enough for you. Repeat as needed. The sloping pocket maker is great for bread that’s just not big enough. Cleaning - I love the dishwasher safe and removable trays, after it cools simply wipe down the then wipe sandwich maker.
customer_reviews.author: Scintilla

customer_reviews.title: Makes fast hot sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I give 4/5 stars because the plastic feels lose and the overall strength of it feels flimsy. Otherwise, it makes wonderful cheese sandwiches and waffle! The cheese does run down underneath the plates but that might be happening because I put one cheese slice too many. I do not put the plates into dishwasher because I have done that with the previous purchase and it was ruined. Hand washing the plates is easy if washed as soon as it cools.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm :)

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The waffle maker is an ok size, making 4 at one time. But it is awful to clean! The batter goes out the back and sides and I have to set it on a cookie sheet to protect the counter. Then when I am done it takes a long time to clean under the removable plates, the sides, the back, the hinged lid. I have tried different measures of batter and it all comes out, even if you get a weird little waffle. We don't have them often so I just deal with it for now
customer_reviews.author: Zanyglasslady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Make bread in no time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. First attempts came out pretty good. I know it will get better with more than just basic recipies. Plenty of recipes in phamplet. Easy clean up . Put Ingredients in order in the machine . Push some button and you'll be eating warm butter bread in no time. I h as very not done so yet but this machine makes pasta and pizza dough. It has recipies for low sodium and gluten free breads. Fun ttu o use.
customer_reviews.author: Don Massa

customer_reviews.title: I use this basically on the dough cycle and it's really perfect for this
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of getting a Zojirushi BB-PAC20, but in the end decided on this. Just didn't want to spend all the money. I use this basically on the dough cycle and it's really perfect for this. I have made bread in it, and it turned out great, but I much prefer to bake in oven. Has great gluten free options as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Loving to "waffle"
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this unit. I live alone, but it would also be great for a couple. I make waffles and they come out perfectly browned. I have made several types of sandwiches, using sandwich bread. You can also use tortillas by cutting them to fit. When I bought this, I also purchased, "Will It Waffle," by Daniel Shumski and am having fun experimenting. I love "crunchy" food and this unit is perfect for creating a crunch for your recipes or for already-prepared food. I have had no problems cleaning the plates, but if your food has a high sugar content, it will come clean easier after soaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, sandwiches are smashed flat
customer_reviews.text: I did research and this one seemed the best choice but the photos are misleading. The last photo shows a sandwich filled with ingredients but the wells are nowhere near that deep. Aside from one piece of cheese, you're not getting anything else in there without it being squeezed out the sides. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: deuxbebes

customer_reviews.title: Very Versitile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grand-daughter and her small children purposely because of the removable grills. They love it!!! She is always coming up with new ideas on how to use it...like waffle print grilled cheese sandwiches or grilled tacos for the kids that are so much less messy because the cheese is melted throughout the taco.
customer_reviews.author: 2yax2go

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: You can remove plates and put in dishwasher for cleaning. Comes with 2 sets of plates-one for waffles, and one for sandwiches, pannis Light on front tells you if it is ready Cons: Waffle plates are more size of belgium waffles, wanted smaller size No timer Latch broke after second use (my husband tried to super glue and it did not work) Not like our old T-fal
customer_reviews.author: winston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two
customer_reviews.text: The machine performs well,although i would have liked a larger cookbook with less emphasis on gluten free recipes (i have no interest in gluten free) and those filled fully half the book. It is easy to clean and the loaf releases more easily than the "Emril" model I had before (which I literally wore out) The bread is tasty and the texture is very good. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kaehler

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor  Quality For a T-Fal Product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero star I would. The piece of junk broke in 2 days. The little piece that is supposed to keep it shut broke the very first time I tried to close it. I could not return it because my husband threw out the box. I'm actually surprised at how poor the quality is, because I have other T-Fal products and they have served me well. Don't waste your money, find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Blazing Glory

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've made everything but waffles. We use it for quesadillas, hot pockets and sandwiches. It gets daily use. I am very please with how easy it is to clean. It says it is dishwasher safe but I will not because metals do not like being in a dishwasher. Great product. Wished I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used this the bottom plate came unlocked. Eggs and cheese got all down inside and created a giant mess. There should be a better way to ensure the plates are locked in place and stay that way all throughout the cooking process.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Machine works great. The directions are a little confusing as to ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine works great. The directions are a little confusing as to the order in which the ingredients are put in, especially for the gluten-free setting. A little unsure if I was doing it right, I just went for it and it came out good. I think there is a little learning curve to it and practice will make perfect. I love that there are so many different cooking/baking options. The machine is extremely quiet. I do wish there was a louder beep to let you know when it’s done - although maybe I just haven’t discovered how to adjust it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Southwick

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich Maker
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! This is not a cheap item. I bought it to make sandwiches. Problem for me is that the wells are not deep enough so doing a grilled cheese and tomato sandwich is awful. Every thing oozes out of the machine, running down on the sides and on to the counter top. The last time I bought one of these was in the 80s and back then the wells were much deeper. This one also comes with plates for waffles, but, needless to say, after the mess with the grilled cheese I haven't used it since. Will be donating this one Purple Heart.
customer_reviews.author: Deejay

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the “flavor “ question , but perhaps it asks whether it alters the food taste ( sandwich or pancake )- no it doesn’t. It does emit some burnt smell in the appliance ( but not in the food) once i start heating, but it disappears with continued use. Overall I’m happy to use this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Best waffle maker on the planet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best waffles in about 2 minutes, they come out perfect EVERY time. Super easy to clean. My teenager loves to make grilled cheese sandwiches with it too! Don't hesitate to buy!! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: AFE

customer_reviews.title: I love the functionality
customer_reviews.text: This press makes lovely panini sandwiches and waffles. I love how it is dishwasher safe, but my one complaint as far as cleaning goes is that when I made waffles (and it was most definitely due to the fact that I put too much batter) there was overflow. When I went to clean the appliance the thing that was difficult was cleaning it with the plates removed, were there were open coils (for heating) that I don't think should be getting wet. As well as the bottom of the appliance which had vents that I was afraid of letting water seep into. Otherwise I love the versatility of this product and I think that it is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: CClark

customer_reviews.title: This was junk
customer_reviews.text: Product broke into several pieces a couple of months after purchase. I will never buy another.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Hambacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice waffle maker, handle gets too hot.
customer_reviews.text: Nice waffle maker. Only concern we have is that the handle gets very hot when we are making waffles. Keeping the ya doe cool to the touch would be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Cadena

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could have hoped for and more. Easy to use, easy to clean,easy to store. Well made, too. Reminds me of the one my mom had, many years ago. (40) Easily switches from waffle maker to grilled sandwiches (aka panini’s). Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay4444

customer_reviews.title: Brittle plastic
customer_reviews.text: The black plastic parts are way too brittle for a household appliance. After 2-month use, the inner side of the handle that holds the latch broke off. I contacted T-Fal Customer Service, and they said they won't send the replacement part because they don't have it. Other than that, it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmph
customer_reviews.text: Well it certainly does what it claims to do. I like it just fine, but I for some reason, in my own warped mind, thought the sandwich would be fully "sealed" on the edges & easy to break in half by the crease it creates. No & no, but it got the job done & regular sandwich bread does fit in these. I have no idea what kind of bread some other reviewers were putting in it that it didn't fit. It fits perfectly with mine. And yes, so easy to clean!!! That's the best part. I haven't made waffles yet, but I'm really looking forward to that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Why have I never owned one of these?! We originally purchased this to see if it would help my daughter eat sandwiches and it did. But my husband and I have ended up using it all the time for our own sandwiches. It's super easy to use, easy to clean, and within 3-5 minutes we have hot, crispy sandwiches. Yum. I bought this model because of the reviews that said you can make thicker sandwiches than with other, cheaper brands. And so far that has proven true - two slices of cheese, two slices of turkey, and some ham...no problem. We've even tried the waffle irons and made good waffles even though we'd never made them before. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Gluten Free Bread machine
customer_reviews.text: I made my first gluten free no stress bread in my new machine last night. The house smelled like heaven. Reminded me of my gluten days. I am very happy with the size and weight of this machine. So much easier to manage than my old monster machine that served me well for many years. The gluten free settings on this machine make it my new favorite kitchen appliance. Easy to clean. I didn't use a premix as recommended by the manufacturer and my bread came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maya C. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, works fine
customer_reviews.text: I think this is more of a middle of the road one as far as the price was concerned. Have no issues with its quality and it makes a darn tasty waffle. Easy to pull the plates and put them in the dishwasher for cleaning. The other plates we've only used once for some sandwiches, worked well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Still working on it.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the waffle making part of it, but it works well as long as you don't put too much batter in it, which I did the first time I used it and made a big mess to clean up. That was my fault. If I behave myself and put less in, it works. I haven't discovered the amount to put in to get a full waffle yet. I am working on it. It does seem to need to get the waffles more done than I want before you can open it and get them out. Still working on that, too.
customer_reviews.author: #1fan

customer_reviews.title: I love this waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: I love this waffle iron!!!! I researched alot of them on line before purchasing and I am VERY happy with this one. The burners that disengage for washing are wonderful. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Received dented machine
customer_reviews.text: Received it damaged. Dented on the side making it misshapen and doesn’t fit the bottom. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: mbenz

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I made waffles and they were thin and inedible. I wish I could return it and get my money back. There was a green light I assumed would indicate doneness, but it never went off. One must time the machine, but it took forever for the first batch and overcooked the rest
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Clement

customer_reviews.title: Removable plates are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the plates are removable and easy to clean. I just gave our 2 month old waffle maker without removable plates to the AZHS thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: E. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great bread maker.
customer_reviews.text: Bread maker is amazing. Worked great out of the box. No issues so far. First 20mins if making bread is noisie but silent after that.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have made a TON of waffles and grilled cheese sandwiches on this thing. They all turn out great! It is very easy to clean. My favorite part is that the plates come off to make cleaning easy. The plates are also dishwasher safe, but I have not tried it yet. I am apprehensive with putting anything "non stick" in the dishwasher. Love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: I love making waffles now..
customer_reviews.text: We love using this to make waffles. One downside: I always manage to have the batter spill over the sides and onto the counter, so that is a bit of a pain to clean up. But I am not really knocking it for that because it could be my technique.,,though it does seem like it is inevitable for this to occur if I want the waffles to be nice and full. We haven't used the sandwhich maker that much because to do it correctly results in a higher bread to filling ratio than a regular grilled sandwhich..and well, less carbs the better. But every now and again it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: khill29

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We make waffles every week and toasted sandwiches as well. The machine was cheap and the quality is good. Easy to wash, I use parchment paper for sandwiches to make it cleaning free. We use waffle grid for potatoes pancakes too, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Scammon

customer_reviews.title: He's happy to be able to make grilled sandwiches so easily
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The clip to close it broke, but my husband says that's happened to every one of these he's ever owned (other brands). He's happy to be able to make grilled sandwiches so easily. I am excited to try the waffle trays.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Removable plates
customer_reviews.text: I will never use a non removable plate waffle maker again. Perfect size. Haven't used the sandwich plates yet but it's a great addition for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AJFHD

customer_reviews.title: This one worked nice but its falling apart by the day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i used to own one back when i was a kid. This one worked nice but its falling apart by the day. First the latch that keeps it closed snapped. Later the bottom plate stopped heating up. I now have to hold it closed with my hand and on top of that i also have to flip the sandwiches. I would give it 5/5 if it didn't have those problems. Despite those problems the sandwiches from this are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Peter.K

customer_reviews.title: Spills from the sides
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about 3 years ago. Have been using it for fresh waffles and sandwiches at least once in three weeks. My kids love the waffles made with this. But every single time I have used it, no matter the amount of batter used, it overflows from the sides making it messy around the counter and the base. I am not sure if it was just a defective piece I received, since I did not see other reviews mentioning this. And now it has reached it's limit and the handle that keeps it locked in position has broken.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Chacko

customer_reviews.title: Really is "EZ" to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: We have been making sandwiches and waffles (and bacon waffles!) in this for a few months now. It really does clean up easy, even after I dripped batter over the edge and some cheese leaked out of the sandwich onto the side. It's easy to use and makes pretty good waffles. My husband loves making sandwiches in it, and it is easy enough to pull out of the cupboard and use that he'll make a toasty sandwich on a whim.
customer_reviews.author: Samie May

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was looking for something with removable plates to make it easier to clean. I replaced my old one because it was scratched up and dirty. I've only used it for grilled cheese sandwich so far and it does an excellent job of making crispy perfectly cooked sandwiches. The plates comes out easily for cleaning. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Mean Cheese Toastie
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a T-Fal toaster before and I wont buy any other brands as this one has removable plates that you can wash. I also like this because it has the sandwich plates and the waffle plates so really I am getting 2 for the price of 1!This doesn't have a timer or anything so you obviously have to keep an eye on your toasties periodically or it will set off the fire alarm. I have no complaints and would recommend this product which makes a mean cheese toastie.
customer_reviews.author: Pixielf72

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great little sandwich toaster. I bought it for the removable plates as fixed ones are a pain. They're light aluminum and cool fairly quickly, and clip in and out very easily. Great non-stick too, so a quick rinse is usually enough. Never had to put them in the dishwasher. The short cord wraps up very neatly underneath. Has waffle plates, too, which I haven't used.
customer_reviews.author: WeedyDave

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use sandwich toaster
customer_reviews.text: . Easy to use . Easy to clean . Easy to put away . My initial sandwich was a bit disappointing (think I over toasted it), but my teen loves it, and I'm going to experiment more. Overall, does what I needed ... primarily as an option for my fussy kids to make their own quick meals. UPDATE: After a few years of languishing in the cupboard, we started using it again. Unfortunately, the latch then broke first at the top, then after gluing that, the bottom went. Hmm. Not really robust enough..
customer_reviews.author: Pressurized Mother

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Pretty easy to clean. I only wished I could make 4 waffles at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Not the machine for overstuffed sandwhich lovers!.
customer_reviews.text: the latch mechanism is poorly designed and weak at best. if your sandwich is at all bigger than the space and you risk the possibility of breaking it as I did, is real. Gluing it back together was the only way to salvage the device. When it works it works well, but for those of us who like an overstuffed sandwich, this is not the machine for us. Disappointing as it was to break it, it does a nice job on simple sandwiches containing very little meat and or cheese..
customer_reviews.author: Steven F Schmit

customer_reviews.title: The smell of fresh bread....
customer_reviews.text: Makes great loaves of bread. Extra ingredient beep has yet to be heard. First time I missed adding the butter, luckily it ended up like french bread. Second time I intentionally hovered around time for extra ingredient add but, never heard the beep. Otherwise, nice to be able to make bread again as my old breadmaker gave up the ghost several months ago. I had been waiting for one to go
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean it will save your marriage
customer_reviews.text: No more brewing resentment over the sticky burnt cooking spray nestled in each intersection with exclamations from your spouse of "I DID clean it!"
customer_reviews.author: Eccentric Introvert

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanup and waffles, sandwich needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The waffle irons are great! Easily replaces my old waffle iron, since it's easy to clean and bigger. The sandwich irons do their jobs, but don't fit any type of bread. Also the way they toast doesn't feel natural
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Heats well and evenly
customer_reviews.text: Love my waffle maker. Works well, quick heat up and pretty even cooking. Also doesn’t take much space when storing as it stands on end
customer_reviews.author: P jolly

customer_reviews.title: I won’t waffle on this review.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best waffles I’ve ever had! Plus, it’s fast, easy and takes seconds to clean. If you’re looking for easy breakfast food, this is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bread maker!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bread maker is amazing!! Easy to follow recipes. Even tried one of them with gluten free flour instead and it still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Bahama Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: waffle and sandwich maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I love grilled cheese sandwiches and this makes it way easier for me to make one. I have had this for a year and recently made 2 grilled cheese sandwiches at the same time and the locking thing broke off. The only way to finish the grilling was to hold the handle together by hand. After I was done and the sandwich maker cooled, in the trash it went.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: OK waffle maker, horrible sandwich one. Both side panel and holder clip broke off while I was trying to lock the apliance to make sandwiches on the very first use. It was just regular whole wheat slices of bread, a slice of ham and a slice of cheese. Nothing fancy. Thickness of the sandwiches should not be an issue at all. I used to have a Philips toaster maker. It could press anything besides the above mentioned: slices of tomato, pickled cucumbers and onion. Never had a problem with that. Guess, cheap plastic and flaws in the design are to blame. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MadHatterNJ

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite waffle iron I've ever purchased. Waffles come out crispy, not soggy. And a sandwich toaster on the flip side is a bonus. Price was reasonable also.
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself as a Christmas gift and made waffles and sandwiches for everyone over the holidays. Sadly, by New Years the grill plates had begun corroding and are a strange white in places now. I try to keep our rust consumption to a minimum. Too bad because it made great waffles.
customer_reviews.author: katheryn9177

customer_reviews.title: Love this waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little waffle iron. I was looking for one with removable plates for better and easier cleaning and this fit the bill. It cleans up quick and easy, the waffles do not stick and they come out perfectly cooked,
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love using this item to make waffles and sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I love using this item to make waffles and sandwiches. Heats up quickly, plates remove easily for cleaning and snap back easily. The closure clip is a little flimsy but I have used it about 5 x and so far, it has not broken. Sometimes the food get down in the crevices of the iron and we have had to remove the screws to get it out. I am glad I purchased it though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love how versatile this device is. I use both the waffle maker and the sandwich maker. It's not as deep as a Belgium waffle maker but they're still good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Works well for gluten free!
customer_reviews.text: I love the gluten free and dough cycles. It works perfectly with recipes frombut I've also used it for recipes by my favorite gluten free flour companies.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: My breakfast is ready!
customer_reviews.text: From now and on, have your breakfast ready by buying this product!! Get bread toast or any kind of bread, cheese or any kind of stuffing, place them inside the bread, put them in this amazing sandwich maker, wait for 1-3 minutes, Enjoy your breakfast!!
customer_reviews.author: Hisham

customer_reviews.title: Love this think the sandwich part works awesome (haven't tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this think the sandwich part works awesome (haven't tried the waffle yet). works great. Got it from warehouse for 10 bucks cheaper. $ star cuz is wasnt cleaned very good by amazon after testing. Edit: i used the waffle maker and it worked great and tasted delish Still amazon did a terrible cleaning job after testing.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon .Y

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, stainless steel exterior and makes excellent breads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, stainless steel exterior and makes excellent breads. The recipe book is a bit limited, so I have taken recipes from the web and followed the order for this machine and they turn out very good.
customer_reviews.author: Martha G

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, easy to use and clean, as well as multifunctional.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Love the fact that I can make grilled cheese or Panini's on the grill. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace an old waffle iron that had non-detachable plates, thus making it impossible to clean. This product seemed like a good size and because it has detachable plates, I thought I'd give it a try. It has worked very well for us. It is super easy to clean, the plates are very easy to remove and replace and it makes great waffles that are the perfect size. Basically, everything you need from a waffle iron.
customer_reviews.author: meymoon

customer_reviews.title: Mama's little helper!
customer_reviews.text: Makes very tasty toasted sandwiches with any kind of bread and filling. I have 3 children, so mine gets a lot of use! Very easy to clean and very convenient. Alll plates are non-stick, easy to remove, and dishwasher safe. This and my popcorn maker were the best purchases I made last year!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but if you wait for green light it will get little black / burn so always before that
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Handle will break just like cusinart model
customer_reviews.text: Broken. Can't handle large Toasties. Handle will break just like cusinart model.
customer_reviews.author: Vu Vu

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad...
customer_reviews.text: It perform pretty well, no real complaints except that the food sticks a little...
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: a good buy and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in RV...I like that it stands up and makes itself small to store. It can make really good sandwiches. My son likes the waffles it makes. The molds come out for cleaning and they clean up easily. But for a cook of my limited skill, if you overfill with waffle batter even a little it drips over and you get to clean areas not meant to have baked on batter...tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hopper

customer_reviews.title: A must have in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This sandwich maker is not for paninis but for awesome steaming hot sandwiches!! Simply take two slices of regular white bread with butter on em', put a slice of ham, a tomato slice and a good amount of cheese in between em' and press them in the sandwich maker for a delicious yet simple taste of heaven.. Enjoy!!! Oh. And you'll love the detachable Teflon plates that Makes it super easy to clean.. Sure.. It does waffles too... But who cares ;D
customer_reviews.author: Geaclaesson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea that you can make hot sandwiches and wafles but man was I dissapointed!!!The handle broke after couple of uses!The plastic is very thin!Don’t waste your money on this!!Poorly made!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bread maker!
customer_reviews.text: This bread maker is awesome! It kneads very well! I finish my bread in the oven and they turn out amazing! Great recipes too!
customer_reviews.author: Tony :)

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend and he uses it 3-4 a week, it's a winner. Makes great waffles & pocket sandwiches. Stands on end, very light, & has a place for the cord to wrap around the back for easy storage. Wish there was a timer but we haven't burnt anything so other then that it has been great! The removable trays make it really easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not very good machine
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this machine. I am using the recipe book that came with it, but the breads don't turn out well. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nao

customer_reviews.title: This one is absolutely the best one I've used over my 40 years of waffle ...
customer_reviews.text: I come from a family of waffle eaters and have seen waffle irons come and go. This one is absolutely the best one I've used over my 40 years of waffle making. the detachable plates.... perfect and easy to use. Love It!!!
customer_reviews.author: BevMoDe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I decided to buy this one to replace our old Proctor Silex. I love the fact that you can take the places out to wash. Our old one did not which made cleaning it difficult. This one works perfect. No problem with uneven heating. Easy to clean. Nov 2015: After some use I noticed cracks by the handle. Not sure if anyone else has experienced this. I contacted the company and was told I can ship it in for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: RetDetSgt

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait, order this product.  It is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandwich and waffle maker. It is super easy to clean. It does not leave stains or food that is difficult to clean. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen gadget.  Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great waffles and sandwiches. Makes me very productive in my kitchen. The only messy part, which is not necessarily the fault of the gadget, is that if you pour more dough than needed for waffles, the excess drips out of the sides and kind of makes a mess of the countertop. With the fuzzy logic of your hands and head, you will eventually figure out the amount to pour in the waffle die without making a mess, not making skinny waffles with holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: rajan paranji

customer_reviews.title: Great lil maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand have several pieces of it in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Damon Pechacek

customer_reviews.title: good bread machine
customer_reviews.text: I have celiac and live in a place where I can't always get good bread. This machine is easy to use and now always have access to bread that I can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the market for a good quality bread machine for a while. Came across this one as a 'gold box' deal. it is an excellent machine very quiet and stable (no wobbling about). Makes a wonderful loaf and has settings for just about anything that you want to make in a bread machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing bread machine
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bread machine. Just made my first gluten free bread. It was a very easy process. Great tastings brad. I'm so glad I made the right decision delusion with thus purchase
customer_reviews.author: William Baltazar

customer_reviews.title: It has a dual purpose and is easy to store. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the waffle iron I have always dreamed of owning. It’s hard to find a waffle iron that is easy to clean. This is it! Plus, It has a dual purpose and is easy to store. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Clark

customer_reviews.title: ... breads so my wife who is gluten intolerant could enjoy breads again and have been very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to make gluten free breads so my wife who is gluten intolerant could enjoy breads again and have been very pleased. The mixes that are available make it easy to experiment with various added ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Deano Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Works great, stays clean
customer_reviews.text: We use this breadmaker all the time, and have almost completely stopped buying bread off the shelf. Works great, stays clean, kind of noisy when it's in the mixing/kneading cycles but that's not a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb Hoge

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make cinnamon roll waffles. Worked great. I am new to making waffles and it overflowed it wasn't super easy to clean, but it was easy enough. Great for making grilled sandwiches. My boyfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TomiLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and solid quality. I am still trying to figure out best waffle recipe, but we all love the concept. Easy to clean and maintain, changing the plates is a breeze. At first use there was some smoke, but it is normal as the protecting oils are burning off. After that - no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and reliably. I was replacing an older grill that had a flat surface in side. I am pleased with the little pockets in the sandwich that this one makes.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful gadget in the kitchen. Ver y good for larger size bread slices. Convinient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jawahir Lal

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as it should except that a slightly above average sandwich (my bread was wider than old-school white bread) made it difficult to latch. Once I did get it to latch, the plastic surrounding the latch at the bottom broke. It's still usable for waffles, but I cannot make sandwiches with it any longer.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Removable plates are very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take up much counter space. Removable plates are very easy to use. Probably the only thing I do not like is the lack of an off/on switch, if it is plugged in, it is on. Not a big deal. I've made some very tasty experiments in it since receiving it. I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapchick

customer_reviews.title: T-fal bread machine.
customer_reviews.text: Works great once I figured it out because the instructions and the recipe book do not offer much help. All of the recipes have only one per program and no help so I have had to experiment a lot. I am happy with the easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Riann

product_meta.title: T-fal 1500637135 SW6100 EZ Clean Easy to Clean Nonstick Sandwich and Waffle Maker with Removable Dishwasher Safe Plates, 2-Slice, Silver
product_meta.description: Style Name:Waffle MakerEnjoy cafe quality meals at home with the T fal SW6100 EZ Clean sandwich and waffle maker. Simple and fun to use, the unit prepares two square shaped Belgian style waffles at a time, each with deep pockets for holding maple syrup, fresh fruit, and other favorite toppings; switch out the plates, and it makes one or two perfectly toasted hot sandwiches, filled with any delicious combo of vegetables, meat, and/or cheese. The two sets of interchangeable waffle/sandwich plates are easily removable, nonstick, and dishwasher safe for quick, hassle free cleanup. Other highlights include red and green lights to indicate ‘power on’ and ‘ready to bake’, a handy cord wrap, and vertical storage for space saving convenience. From Sunday brunch to weekday lunches, even dinner or dessert, the T fal EZ Clean nonstick sandwich and waffle maker offers ease of use while enhancing any repertoire of recipes.
feature_bullets: 2 sets of interchangeable sandwich and waffle plates
Waffle plates make 2 square shaped Belgian style waffles at a time
Use the sandwich plates to to make delicious pocket sandwiches any time of day
On/ready indicator lights; cord storage; nonstick and dishwasher safe plates for easy cleaning
Indicator lights advise if power is on and when the plates are ready for cooking

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
